name: The Land of Glass
description: The Land of Glass is a collectable card game with a twist: speed. It's CCG meets action RPG, combining card collecting and deck building with frantic combat. Choose your heroes, build your deck, and save Vitrerran.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 level Graphics Card Storage: 750 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 4.5 level Graphics Card Storage: 750 MB available space
